title: Ivan Novoseltsev (footballer)
text:
Ivan Yevgenyevich Novoseltsev (; born 25 August 1991) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who plays as a <a href="centre-back">centre-back</a> for <a href="FC%20Arsenal%20Tula">FC Arsenal Tula</a>.
Club career.
In January 2015, Novoseltsev signed for <a href="FC%20Rostov">FC Rostov</a>.
On 31 August 2016, Novoseltsev moved to <a href="FC%20Zenit%20Saint%20Petersburg">FC Zenit Saint Petersburg</a>.
On 31 January 2018, Novoseltsev joined <a href="FC%20Arsenal%20Tula">FC Arsenal Tula</a> on loan until the end of the 2017–18 season.
On 27 July 2018, Novoseltsev joined <a href="FC%20Anzhi%20Makhachkala">Anzhi Makhachkala</a> on loan until January 2019.
On 29 January 2019, Novoseltsev joined <a href="FC%20Rostov">Rostov</a> on loan until the end of the season.
On 2 July 2019, he left Zenit for <a href="PFC%20Sochi">PFC Sochi</a>.
On 2 July 2021, he returned to <a href="FC%20Arsenal%20Tula">Arsenal Tula</a>.
International career.
Novoseltsev made his debut for the <a href="Russia%20national%20football%20team">Russia national football team</a> on 31 March 2015 in a friendly game against <a href="Kazakhstan%20national%20football%20team">Kazakhstan</a>.
